entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.4°C
entry.summary:

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
